## Properties

| Property            | Attribute            | Description                 | Type      | Default                |
| ------------------- | -------------------- | --------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------- |
| `customPlaceholder` | `custom-placeholder` | HTML customPlaceholder prop | `string`  | `'Write some text...'` |
| `isDisabled`        | `is-disabled`        | HTML is-disabled prop       | `boolean` | `false`                |
| `value`             | `value`              | HTML value prop             | `string`  | `''`                   |
